description: Soul Immolation has a 25% chance to reignite after it expires, reapplying its effect.

name: Voidrush
description: Collapsing Star reduces the cooldown of Voidblade by 10 sec. Voidblade and The Hunt briefly reduce your Fury drain while in Void Metamorphosis.

name: Soulforged Blades
description: Hungering Slash and Voidblade's critical strike chance is increased by 15%.

name: Volatile Instinct
description: Entering demon form causes your next Voidsurge to repeat after a short delay.

name: Singular Strikes
description: Voidblade damage increased by 25%. Hungering Slash deals 50% increased damage to its primary target.

name: Improved Consume
description: Consume deals 10% increased damage and its cast time is reduced by ${-$s2/1000}.2 sec.

name: Singed Spirit
description: Soul Immolation generates an additional ${$s2*$1241937s3} Fury over its duration.

name: Umbral Blade
description: Reap's cooldown is reduced by your Haste.

name: Gift of the Void
description: Your critical strike chance is increased by 2%.

name: Eradicate
description: Slam your Scythe to the ground, dealing 0 Cosmic damage to all enemies within a 25 yd cone in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets. Eradicate gathers up to 4 nearby souls. |CFFffffffGenerates $s3 Fury.|R

name: Harness the Cosmos
description: Voidfall Meteor damage increased by 15%.
